roleset.name: not changed, influenced or modified
roleset.note: Added by Julia based on BOLT-4,5. related to affect.01.

example.name: arg1
example.text: We may be somewhat insulated by the nature of our local economy , but we will not be unaffected .

example.name: both args
example.text: Soil mineral nitrogen availability was unaffected by elevated atmospheric pCO2 in a four year old field experiment (Swiss FACE).
example.arg: by elevated atmospheric pCO2 in a four year old field experiment (Swiss FACE)
